body_html:
Sorry for not being able to provide a concrete example of how to reproduce the problem. I've been unable to precisely track it down in my experiments. Good to hear you're on it, @chihuahua!

In the diagram below, is what you mean that the kernel and bias Variables within the conv1d_2 box really belong to conv1d_3? And that the kernel and bias Variables within the conv1d_1 box really belong to conv1d_2?

Yes, exactly.
